comments.body:
Hacked in a fix for r635. I don't know why this is happening, but I just swallowed the error down into the abyss so it won't break anything now. Whatever was previously broken is still broken, though. It just isn't leaking into TMW from DogTag anymore.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
